issue.title: Simple collision geometries inaccurate in some crucial places for v4 and v5 simple models

content.raw: The upper torso in it's current form also causes collisions between the arms and torso in some joint configurations that do not cause collisions on the real robot. Given the curved shape, it is not trivial get this accurate with simple shapes, however.
content.html: The upper torso in it's current form also causes collisions between the arms and torso in some joint configurations that do not cause collisions on the real robot. Given the curved shape, it is not trivial get this accurate with simple shapes, however.
